channel.title: Please help, NPC drop problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have a problem with NPC drops. I am using a source called PwnScape, and I can't find Item2.Java, only npchandler.java and npcdrops.cfg. I do know how to add NPC's but this source is much different. The only problem is that there is no Item2.java, and I was thinking that perhaps all i have to do is write the drop into npcdrops.cfg...
The other source i have coded is Testscape and it works fine for Testscape. Just no Item2.java in PwnScape source.
If anyone has any suggestions they would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Please help, NPC drop problem
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

Your Welcome mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, NPC drop problem
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

Thanks a lot man, it helped… I got it working now.
I was just a bit confused as it seems more complicated for some other sources like Test.

Thanks a lot ar-temi-s, greatly appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, NPC drop problem
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

In the Config Folder look for npcdrops.cfg

You should see something along the lines of

npcdrop = 1883 995 10000 50 npcdrop = 1883 1635 1 7 npcdrop = 1883 892 10 25 npcdrop = 1883 6099 1 20 npcdrop = 1883 2997 1 15 npcdrop = 1883 6235 1 5 npcdrop = 1883 6257 1 10 npcdrop = 1884 995 10000 50 npcdrop = 1884 1692 1 7 npcdrop = 1884 7360 1 5 npcdrop = 1884 1632 5 10 npcdrop = 1884 6313 1 50 npcdrop = 1884 6315 1 30 npcdrop = 1884 6317 1 15

to add a new npc drop do the following

npcdrop = NpcID	ITEMID	ITEMAMMOUNT	DROPRATEINPERCENTS

so like if i wanted a man to drop 100k 100% of the time i would do

npcdrop = 1    995      100000  100

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
